short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extend Strava activities and add tags

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You've ridden/run hundreds or thousands of times and Strava has become a part of your post-ride/run ritual.  Your activity log is 100's of pages long and finding similar activities to compare is a headache.

Q) How do you find similar activities to compare to your latest ride/run?

A) Tag your activities and then use the filters to view your tagged activities.
